# Teed - Curate and share your gear
# https://teed.so

## What is Teed?
Teed is a platform for creating, organizing, and sharing curated collections of gear, products, and recommendations. Think "link in bio" but for your actual stuff - the gear you use, love, and want to share with others.

## Who is Teed for?
- Golfers sharing their bag setups
- Photographers documenting camera gear
- Content creators building equipment lists
- Travelers creating packing lists
- Tech enthusiasts sharing desk setups
- Musicians cataloging instruments
- Outdoor adventurers organizing hiking gear
- Fitness enthusiasts tracking gym equipment

## Core Features
- **AI-powered product identification**: Upload photos and Teed automatically identifies products
- **Beautiful shareable pages**: Each collection gets a clean, branded URL at teed.so/u/[username]/[collection]
- **QR code generation**: Physical sharing for in-person recommendations
- **Affiliate link support**: Monetize your recommendations with affiliate links
- **Permanent preservation**: Collections don't expire or get penalized for freshness
- **Mobile-first design**: Create and share from any device
- **Social features**: Follow creators, discover collections, build community

## Key Pages
/ - Homepage with featured collections
/discover - Browse public collections by category
/manifesto - Our philosophy on thoughtful curation
/for/golfers - Golf bag setups and gear
/for/photographers - Camera gear collections
/for/creators - Content creator equipment
/for/travelers - Packing lists and travel gear
/for/outdoors - Hiking and camping gear
/for/tech - Desk setups and tech gear
/for/musicians - Music equipment collections
/for/fitness - Gym and workout gear

## How Teed Works
1. Sign up at teed.so/join
2. Create a collection (called a "bag")
3. Add items via photo upload, URL paste, or manual entry
4. Organize with sections and descriptions
5. Share your unique URL or QR code
6. Track engagement and grow your audience

## Use Cases
- Share your golf bag setup with playing partners
- Document camera gear for insurance purposes
- Create affiliate-linked gear recommendations
- Build travel packing list templates
- Organize tech setups for YouTube videos
- Catalog music equipment for session musicians

## Comparisons
- **vs Linktree**: Teed is for showcasing actual products and gear, not just links. Rich product cards with images, prices, and descriptions.
- **vs Amazon Lists**: Teed works with products from any store, not just Amazon. Better visual presentation and sharing features.
- **vs Notion/Spreadsheets**: Teed is purpose-built for gear collections with specialized features like photo AI and QR codes.

## API & Integration
- oEmbed support for embedding collections in blogs and websites
- RSS feeds for collection updates
- Open Graph and Twitter Card support for social sharing
- JSON-LD structured data for search engines

## Company Information
- Website: https://teed.so
- Support: Available through in-app feedback
- Privacy: https://teed.so/legal/privacy
- Terms: https://teed.so/legal/terms

## Technical Details
- Built with Next.js and React
- Hosted on Vercel
- Database on Supabase (PostgreSQL)
- Images served via Supabase Storage CDN
